Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. the command of George H.W. Bush 's son, President Bush . Another view on war's end The journal Foreign Policy also questions whether the war truly was successful. Memories of Desert Storm In ending the war unilaterally before Saddam Hussein had been chastened, the George H.W. Bush administration condemned the United States to a long-term presence in the Gulf in an effort to contain Iraq. This presence, and the sanctions imposed on Iraq due to Saddam Hussein 's recalcitrance, in the end served as a rallying cry for jihadists such as Osama Bin Laden against the United States and its friends in the region. Colin Powell , chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff under the first George H.W. Bush and secretary of state under the second, was among officials gathered with the elder George H.W. I've now scored 40 points on the highest stage you can ever score, said Linas Kleiza , whose previous career-high of 29 came March 15 against the Los Angeles Lakers.
